name: Annalynn '16
summary: Annalynn is back at it once again! As her day at work in the mines is about to come to a close, Annalynn discovers a hidden crevasse from an otherwise well-known cave. With the allure of adventure too strong to resist, she crawls through the narrow passageway and discovers an underground utopia of many treasures, but also many dangers! Now, in hot pursuit by the Venom Brigade (Randy, Handy, Candy, and Mike) and their unexpected arachnid ally (Gil), Annalynn must defend herself with the mystical Blinding Rubies as she explores this mysterious cave for its many riches!

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Annalynn '16 - A 2D platformer made in the style of arcade games from the early '80s!
